entry.def: Self-discipline is the ability to control yourself and to make yourself work hard or behave in a particular way without needing anyone else to tell you what to do.

example.ex: Exercising at home alone requires a tremendous amount of self-discipline.
example.tran: 自己在家锻炼需要很强的自我约束能力。

auth_sentence.content: Those virtues pragmatism, loyalty, selfdiscipline, modesty, plain-speaking are common to those who share his vintage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those virtues pragmatism, loyalty, selfdiscipline, modesty, plain-speaking are common to those who share his vintage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those virtues pragmatism, loyalty, selfdiscipline, modesty, plain-speaking are common to those who share his vintage.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
